name: Truth or Dare - Family Game Night
name_original: Truth or Dare - Family Game Night
description:
Welcome to Truth or Dare - Family Game Night

Now you have your app version of this most popular game.

1. Simply add the players
2. Ask the player if they want Truth or Dare
3. Click the button to reveal the question or Dare
4. Take it in turns to play until bored or all asleep.

Simple and fun for all the family this Christmas.

Check out some of our Santa Apps including the awesome Santa Radio

Produced by VoiceoverGuy Media Apps
www.voiceoverguy.co.uk
